Events.Text: <i>Over the bustle of the crowd one of the lounge-goers caught my eye,░ not least of all because her outfit stood out above the clubbing gear of the other patrons.░ Sipping a cocktail, her sheer slip gave her outline an undeniable elegance.
Events.Title: %playername%

Events.Text: Mercy,░ nice to meet you.░
Events.Title: Mercy

Events.Text: <i>Time on the dance floor seemed a little too much like the deep end...░ Anyway, I didn't want to crowd Coby.░ Maybe after I got a feel for the lounge?░ Speaking of...
Events.Title: %playername%

Events.Text: <i>She seemed happy enough taking shallow sips from her glass,░ her eyes on one of the girls giving her all on the pole.░ Maybe I should introduce myself?
Events.Title: %playername%

Choices.Text: Take a seat beside her, maybe a conversation will start.
Go over and put an arm on the couch, draw her attention.
She looks like she has her eyes on the prize already. (Leave.)

Events.Text: Not exactly what I'm looking for, maybe another time.
Events.Title: %playername%

Events.Text: Looks like she's already occupied,░ I'll try somone else.░
Events.Title: %playername%

Events.Text: <i>I headed over, bobbing to the music.░ Playing it cool, I dropped her a smile and took a seat beside her,░ admiring the same show from a respectable distance:░ wouldn't want to crowd her.
Events.Title: %playername%

Events.Text: <i>Not wanting to wait around, I headed over,░ moving to the beat.░ Slipping in next to the couch, I leaned against the wall,░ hand on the plush fabric near her shoulder as I used the height difference as an excuse to lean in.░
Events.Title: %playername%

Events.Text: Couldn't help notice you enjoying the show.
Events.Title: %playername%

Events.Text: <i>She seemed interesting enough,░ and wasn't with anyone from what I could tell.░ No point in being here and not introducing myself!░ I made my way over, trying my best to keep time to the music.░ She caught my eye and I leant in to speak over the background sounds.
Events.Title: %playername%

Events.Text: Hey, I'm %playername%,░ mind if I sit with you?
Events.Title: %playername%

Events.Text: <i>It wasn't long before the elegant bovid inched a little closer,░ catching my eye, she smiled.
Events.Title: %playername%

Events.Text: <i>She seemed a little preoccupied by the dancers,░ admiring them with a keen regard.░ Maybe she was a dancer herself?░ Or just judging the competition maybe?░
Events.Title: %playername%

Events.Text: <i>She didn't pull away,░ giving me a slight grin.
Events.Title: %playername%

Events.Text: Beautiful,░ aren't they?
Events.Title: Mercy

Events.Text: Yeah, gotta agree with you there,░ I've never seen so many good-looking people all in one place.
Events.Title: %playername%

Events.Text: It takes a lot of poise,░ and a certain degree of confidence of course.░ Do you see how she holds herself?░ Haha, ░I suppose it's silly to say I'm envious?
Events.Title: Mercy

Events.Text: As she took another sip from her drink her hand wobbled slightly. ░She was still smiling warmly,░ but it seemed like her flush was more from the alcohol than the dancers.░ Was she drunk?
Events.Title: %playername%

Events.Text: %playername%,░ an absolute pleasure to meet you.
Events.Title: %playername%

Events.Text: <i>'A pleasure'?░ Okay,░ maybe not my best line, but I couldn't help feeling a little intimidated:░ her dress looked like it was straight off a runway.░
Events.Title: %playername%

Choices.Text: Not really my area of expertise: I can't dance.

Events.Text: Is that how you feel when you're sober too?░ I'm sure you've heard the term 'beer goggles' before, right?
Events.Title: %playername%

Events.Text: <i>She blushed a little, giving a playful laugh.░ She swirled the drink.
Events.Title: %playername%

Events.Text: Nothing worse than a philosophical drunk, huh?░
Events.Title: Mercy

Events.Text: <i>Maybe I'll come back after she's cooled off a little.░ There's plenty of other people here, afterall.
Events.Title: %playername%

Events.Text: Well, I just wanted to say hi.░ You seem all set here,░ but maybe I'll check in after I grab a drink and look around a little...
Events.Title: %playername%

Events.Text: Mhmm,░ I'll see you around.
Events.Title: Mercy

Events.Text: <i>She seemed open enough to chatting more,░ I took the opportunity to slip in beside her on the couch.░ She took her eyes from the dancer as I leaned in to speak,░ finger trailing the couch space between us:░ mission accomplished.
Events.Title: %playername%

Events.Text: <i>She seemed open enough to chatting more,░ I took the opportunity to slip in beside her on the couch.░ She took her eyes from the dancer:░ mission accomplished.
Events.Title: %playername%

Events.Text: I'm just trying to gauge how much you've had,░ you're not going to realize how way out of my league you are in the morning are you?
Events.Title: %playername%

Events.Text: Ha,░ not that drunk dear.░ I'd say my perspective is clear enough,░ and,░ for the record,░ you're measuring up just fine.
Events.Title: Mercy

Events.Text: I see what you mean:░ she's got everything going for her,░ nice body,░ nice moves.░ She knows how to work it.
Events.Title: %playername%

Events.Text: <i>Mercy took another sip of her drink and smirked.░ Through flushed cheeks her eyes were a brilliant blue,░ she pointed to the dancer.
Events.Title: %playername%

Events.Text: Honestly, she's not exactly rocking anything I'm looking for...░ <i>heh.
Events.Title: %playername%

Events.Text: Honestly, that's not really my area of expertise.░ I can dance about as well as I can unicycle...░ actually,░ they look kind of similar.░
Events.Title: %playername%

Events.Text: <i>She laughed and patted the couch beside her,░ toasting the embarrassed smile we shared.
Events.Title: %playername%

Events.Text: I won't judge,░ right now I'd end up on my ass too...
Events.Title: Mercy

Events.Text: No, a pretty woman like you?░ I guess I'm surprised,░ you look like you have everything together.░ Honestly, I'm the one who should be feeling a little out-classed.
Events.Title: %playername%

Events.Text: Is that the kind of girl you go for?
Events.Title: Mercy

Choices.Text: (Admit liking the dancer, she is hot, after all.)
Is there even one type of person to stick to?

Events.Text: If we're being objective here:░ she flaunts what she's got so well, how could I not?░ I'd have to be blind.
Events.Title: %playername%

Events.Text: <i>Mercy let out a sad grunt into her drink,░ her cocky expression slipping a little.
Events.Title: %playername%

Events.Text: Maybe you should go try your luck with her then?░ If you don't mind, I'm gonna get a top up.░ I'll see you around.
Events.Title: Mercy

Events.Text: What did I say?
Events.Title: %playername%

Events.Text: <i>Mercy got up without saying anything more, leaving me on the couch by myself.░ I probably shouldn't be here when she gets back.░ As she smoothed her dress, crossing the lounge,░ did I catch sight of a bulge?...░ Hmmm... ░interesting.
Events.Title: %playername%

Events.Text: <i>Letting out a sad grunt she quickly downed her drink,░ her cocky expression slipping.
Events.Title: %playername%

Events.Text: Well, good luck with that.░ We're probably wasting each other's time here...░ I'm gonna go top up,░ I'll see you around.
Events.Title: Mercy

Events.Text: I thought you'd understand...
Events.Title: Mercy

Events.Text: Well,░ if we're being candid, I am here with you rather than chasing skirt on the dance floor.░ Trust me, if I didn't want to be here with you,░ I'd have left already.░
Events.Title: %playername%

Events.Text: I guess you could say I appreciate all sorts.░ Sheesh, okay, that sounds like I'd go with anyone...░ I have varied tastes, I guess?░ Not that I don't see what you mean,░ but here I am talking to you instead of her.░ Lucky her?
Events.Title: %playername%

Events.Text: <i>Mercy smiled and nudged me with her shoulder,░ the confidence shining through her grin.
Events.Title: %playername%

Events.Text: Lucky me,░ smooth operator.░ So, %playername%,░ join me at the bar?░ I'd rather be talking to you than looking at her right now.
Events.Title: Mercy

Choices.Text: (Let her down gently, I'm not feeling it. (Leave.))

Events.Text: <i>She had an infectious flirtiness to her,░ maybe that was the drink, ░but as she stood her fingers ran down my leg giving me goosebumps.
Events.Title: %playername%

Events.Text: <i>Maybe I'll come back after she's cooled off a little.░ There's plenty of other people here, afterall.
Events.Title: %playername%

Events.Text: Well, I'm glad I could cheer you up.░ I have to go check on my brother,░ but maybe I'll check back after?
Events.Title: %playername%

Events.Text: Oh...░ Okay, I see.░ Catch you later then.
Events.Title: Mercy

Events.Text: Shouldn't I be the one taking you to the bar?
Events.Title: %playername%

Events.Text: <i>I stood before she could lead the way, all the better not to let her advances cool:░ touching her side as if about to waltz,░ fingers running down the sheer fabric of her cocktail dress.░ I felt the curve of her waist in my spreading fingers as I leant in with a smirk, faking a need to speak over the music.░ The scent of her shampoo was more intoxicating than any cocktail.
Events.Title: %playername%

Events.Text: <i>Her enthusiasm was contagious as I stood to follow her.░ I smiled back, hips giving the slightest sway as we walked together.░ I let my eyes run down her form, not caring that she saw:░ admiring her posture,░ the curve of her hips and fullness of her bust,░ as the dress caught the club lights and lit her in a thousand complimentary shades.
Events.Title: %playername%

Events.Text: Lead the way...
Events.Title: %playername%

Events.Text: Got me all to yourself, babe.
Events.Title: Mercy

Events.Text: <i>She leaned into my touch, slipping her hoof between my feet,░ stepping close as if we had danced this way a hundred times.░ Her thigh peaking from the dress inches from my hand as she met my eyes.░
Events.Title: %playername%

Events.Text: Though, I'll be honest,░ I'd rather we were alone if we're going to tango this tango...░ Let's get a drink,░ see where the night takes us?░
Events.Title: Mercy

Events.Text: So,░ what're you drinking?
Events.Title: Mercy

Events.Text: A fine choice.
Events.Title: Mercy

Events.Text: I don't mind showing you the ropes.░ How about... a Cherry Daiquiri?
Events.Title: Mercy

Choices.Text: No thanks, I'll get something else.
Actually, I forgot something. (Let her down gently.)

Events.Text: Hmph...░ Well if you aren't going to play, you shouldn't tease...
Events.Title: Mercy

Events.Text: <i>The bartender made our drinks as she sat pretty,░ a jewel at the bar.░ It occurred to me to ask about her outfit.
Events.Title: %playername%

Choices.Text: (What more is there to say? (Say nothing.))

Events.Text: I mean, this scene isn't exactly my style...░ I was surprised to see someone classy like you here.░ Trust me, if I didn't want to be here with you,░ I'd have left already.░
Events.Title: %playername%

Events.Text: So, your dress? It's boutique right?░ It certainly caught my eye over this sea of Spicer's Gift Ts and crop tops.
Events.Title: %playername%

Events.Text: A daiquiri?░ Not wanting me to butch up too much, huh?
Events.Title: %playername%

Events.Text: <i>She laughed and licked her lips, leaning close,░ her touch set my skin on fire.
Events.Title: %playername%

Events.Text: Think of it as...░ getting a taste of the cherry, for now?
Events.Title: Mercy

Events.Text: If it's really not for you, that's fine...░ I figured you might wanna see me tie the knot in a cherry stem.
Events.Title: Mercy

Events.Text: It's a fine choice,░ when you put it that way.
Events.Title: %playername%

Events.Text: <i>It was hard not to be aware of how forward she was being, not that I minded it entirely.░ Coby certainly had horror stories of real horn dogs here, and she certainly didn't seem like that.░ I shifted in my seat, keeping my legs together as I leaned on the bar:░ damn, like being a teenager all over again...
Events.Title: %playername%

Events.Text: Good eye, yes,░ it's a Typhoon original.░ Do you think it looks good on me?
Events.Title: Mercy

Events.Text: You know,░ for the classiest girl in this place, you've got a dirty mind.░ And here I was afraid you wouldn't be my kind of girl.
Events.Title: %playername%

Events.Text: If it's really not for you, that's fine...░ I figured you might wanna see me tie a knot in the cherry stem.
Events.Title: Mercy

Events.Text: <i>Was I really that obvious in this outfit?░ She muttered something under her breath that might have been 'Bow-wow' and my face went all sorts of colors.
Events.Title: %playername%

Events.Text: <i>All that getting a taste talk had my blood running like a furnace.░ I edged close, fingers trailing down her arm as my knee parted hers under the lip of the bar.░ I swallowed hard: here goes nothing!
Events.Title: %playername%

Events.Text: There's pretty much one thing I'm in the mood to taste now...░ Please don't make me watch you wrap your lips around another glass,░ I think we both know better uses for them.░
Events.Title: %playername%

Events.Text: I...░ Well, okay...░ you got me there.
Events.Title: Mercy

Events.Text: <i> Watching her smirk and feeling her bare knees squeezing mine, I leant in.░ Her lips were soft against mine, opening up to let my own in as we shared a slow kiss. ░As my hand slid to her waist, however, she froze░ - her hand coming up to touch my shoulder.░
Events.Title: %playername%

Events.Text: Woah there cowboy... ░That's enough for now, I think...
Events.Title: Mercy

Choices.Text: (Press my luck again, she teased first.)
(Move back, things are going too fast.)
(Hold where I am, see what she does.)

Events.Text: <i> The slap resonated across the bar,░ one of the patrons two stools over snickered as a hot wash of shame came over me.░ Shaking her head, Mercy stormed out,░ almost toppling over two of the dancers░ - she was way more drunk than I thought...
Events.Title: %playername%

Events.Text: Actually, Mercy,░ I'm sorry but this isn't working for me.░ I shouldn't have lead you on,░ but I made a mistake, sorry.
Events.Title: %playername%

Events.Text: Fine...░ I'm sorry you feel that way,░ but I know when to take a hint...
Events.Title: Mercy

Events.Text: I thought you,░ of all people,░ would understand.
Events.Title: Mercy

Events.Text: <i>Standing awkwardly, Mercy blushed as she held her purse over an obvious bulge in her dress░, the conversation had been having an obvious effect. ░ Well...░ that was certainly a development.░
Events.Title: %playername%

Events.Text: <i>Walking slowly, she made her way out of the club,░ tottering slightly on the shiny dance floor.░ Wow, she was pretty drunk too...
Events.Title: %playername%

Choices.Text: Shame... that might have changed things.

Events.Text: <i>Looking back to the bar, she seems to have left her business card with her number.░ A gallery manager, huh?░ I might've guessed.░ Maybe I should try her when she's sober?
Events.Title: %playername%

Events.Text: <i>One thing at a time %playername%...░ After giving Coby a hard time all these years,░ I should probably follow my own advice and cool it.
Events.Title: %playername%

Events.Text: <i>Her eyes seemed to look me over, one hand idly adjusting the strap of her slip as she bit her lip.░ Snickering under her breath, she exhaled in a ragged tempo.
Events.Title: %playername%

Events.Text: Phew...░ and here I thought the night would be dull...░ You know, I really didn't expect to meet someone like you here.
Events.Title: Mercy

Events.Text: Some like me?░ Smart? ░Attractive?░ Flirty?░ Well, I figured that was par for the course here.
Events.Title: %playername%

Events.Text: <i>She cut me off with a laugh,░ blushing more as she picked up the new drink.
Events.Title: %playername%

Events.Text: Someone competent is what I mean.░ If we... well...
Events.Title: Mercy

Events.Text: <i>Heart pounding, I shifted under her hungry look.░ I gulped a little, my turn to blush.
Events.Title: %playername%

Events.Text: If we what?
Events.Title: %playername%

Events.Text: If we were somewhere more private...░ Well... I think we might both be a little more comfortable.
Events.Title: Mercy

Choices.Text: (Move back, things are going too fast.)

Events.Text: <i>With an effort to be 'gentlemanly', I sat back from her.░ Taking a sip of my own drink gave my pulse time to stop pounding as I searched for a topic.
Events.Title: %playername%

Events.Text: I...░ I don't know what you're talking about...
Events.Title: %playername%

Events.Text: <i>I felt like my cheeks might split from the grin on my face,░ at least it would stop them bursting into flame.░ The goat girl reached out her hand and touched my jaw,░ my thighs clamped together.
Events.Title: %playername%

Events.Text: I think we're a little far gone for the shy game, babe.
Events.Title: Mercy

Events.Text: <i>Slipping her hand from my face she gave a smirk,░ lifting her drink to her lips she drank slowly from the bright liquid.░ Her eyes didn't leave me, they simply traveled down over my chest to where my own hand had balled itself at my thigh.
Events.Title: %playername%

Events.Text: <i>Shifting under her gaze she raised an eyebrow as if to say 'No?'░ I nodded, biting my lip as I let my thighs relax and my legs spread enough for her to see the effect of her words on me.
Events.Title: %playername%

Events.Text: Okay...░ More than just a little.
Events.Title: %playername%

Events.Text: <i>She set down her drink, leaning in as that hypnotic smirk ran across her face again,░ her fingers tiptoeing down her own collarbone to the place where her sheer dress covered the full bust.░ She drew my eyes to her body so skillfully I was lost in her form before I even knew it.
Events.Title: %playername%

Events.Text: Oh, shit!
Events.Title: Mercy

Events.Text: <i>Before I could fall into her body completely, her cocktail glass shimmied off the bar.░ Cold, ruby liquid spilled over the counter in a waterfall murder scene that landed in her lap.░ One of the patrons jeered and her blush spread.
Events.Title: %playername%

Events.Text: F-fuck... ░Not the wake-up call I wanted...░ I'm sorry...
Events.Title: Mercy

Events.Text: <i>Mercy stood abruptly, trying to pat down the silken fabric from her spill.░ My eyes still locked on her body, I could see the fabric stick to her thin waist and thighs,░ outlining an obvious anatomy I was more than familiar with myself at this particular point in our teasing.
Events.Title: %playername%

Events.Text: Shit...░ %playername%, I'm sorry.░ I've made a damn fool of myself.
Events.Title: Mercy

Events.Text: <i>Rummaging in her purse, she tossed a business card down on the bar,░ those bright eyes of hers didn't dare look at me as she made her apologies and rushed out.░
Events.Title: %playername%

Events.Text: <i>She'd clearly been enjoying the 'talk' as much as me...░ Who knew?
Events.Title: %playername%

Events.Text: <i>Looking back at the bar, she seems to have left her business card.░ A gallery manager, huh?░ I might've guessed.░ If I wanted, I could call her again on this number,░ maybe when she's sober...
Events.Title: %playername%

Events.Text: Sorry...
Events.Title: Mercy

Events.Text: This is too interesting to pass up.
Events.Title: %playername%

Events.Text: Not my type.
Events.Title: %playername%

Events.Text: Actually,░ I think if you wanted to fit in you'd have probably worn something a little less 'formal wear'.░ It's fine at some restaurant,░ but you'd be better off in some shorts or something,░ show off what you've got going on.░
Events.Title: %playername%

Events.Text: Honestly, it's just fabric to me.░ I don't care one way or another.
Events.Title: %playername%

Events.Text: I think it's a flattering cut: it shows you're a woman who's not to be taken lightly.░ I like it, it suits someone like you perfectly.
Events.Title: %playername%

Events.Text: I can't praise the outfit enough, it caught my eye from across the room,░ and it lead me to the bar with the most attractive woman in the place.
Events.Title: %playername%

Events.Text: <i>Smirking, trying to match her confidence,░ I ran the back of my fingers down the sheer fabric, watching the fabric catch ripples of light.░ Better to be bold with someone like her,░ I hope.
Events.Title: %playername%

Events.Text: Now, I'd be lying if I said I wasn't interested in seeing more of the woman under it...░ but I'm more than liking what I see so far.
Events.Title: %playername%

Events.Text: Hey,░ I'm %playername%, by the way.░ Enjoying the show?
Events.Title: %playername%

Events.Text: <i>Maybe I'll come back after she's cooled off a little. ░There's plenty of other people here, afterall.
Events.Title: %playername%

Events.Text: Damn...░ Actually, cancel that.░ I'm sorry to bail,░ I should really make sure brother isn't getting himself in any trouble,░ but maybe I'll check back after?░ I'm glad I could cheer you up a little.
Events.Title: %playername%

Events.Text: Oh...░ Okay, I think I'll go find my seat...░ Catch you later.
Events.Title: Mercy

Events.Text: <i>Mercy got up without saying anything more, leaving me at the bar by myself.░ As she smoothed her dress, crossing the lounge,░ did I catch sight of a bulge?...░ hmmm... ░interesting.
Events.Title: %playername%

Events.Text: I admit it,░ you piqued my interest the moment I saw you.
Events.Title: %playername%

Events.Text: <i>I couldn't help feeling suave in her presence.░ The goat girl reached out her hand and I intercepted it with my own, ░pulling it to my face with a grin and kissing the meat of her thumb,░ I couldn't hide my reaction to her.
Events.Title: %playername%

Events.Text: My,░ how proper.
Events.Title: Mercy

Events.Text: <i>Slipping her hand from my face she gave a smirk,░ lifting her drink to her lips she drank slowly from the bright liquid.░ Her eyes didn't leave me, they simply traveled down over my chest,░ taking an inventory of my body.
Events.Title: %playername%

Events.Text: A facade,░ I assure you.
Events.Title: %playername%

Events.Text: <i>I drank her in, from the roundness of her rump to the fullness of her smile.░ Shifting my legs apart, I watched her eyes trace the obvious effect of her words as she took a hungry sip of her drink.
Events.Title: %playername%

Events.Text: <i>I bit my lip to stop a small moan as her finger ran over the curve of her bust and down,░ downwards-
Events.Title: %playername%

Events.Text: Thanks...░ It means a lot, really. And, hey,░ you're not too bad looking yourself.
Events.Title: Mercy

Events.Text: Fair enough,░ should have guessed.
Events.Title: Mercy

Events.Text: Maybe,░ I could stand a few pointers sometime.░
Events.Title: %playername%

Events.Text: That'd be interesting,
Events.Title: Mercy

Events.Text: <i>Okay... deep breath,░ small talk:░ I swear I used to be good at this.
Events.Title: %playername%

Events.Text: So... The small talk options have certainly been looking up.░ A couch,░ the bar,░ maybe we'll get crazy and talk over in one of those booths?
Events.Title: %playername%

Choices.Text: (Drink and hope she comes up with something.)

Events.Text: Haha...░ Well,░ the weather has been good recently too, right?
Events.Title: Mercy

Events.Text: <i>She laughed heartily, leaning forward on the bar a little and looking at me with curiousity.
Events.Title: %playername%

Events.Text: I could impress you by reading the bottle names over there?░ I know all my letters,░ even the fancy German ones.
Events.Title: %playername%

Events.Text: Fancy~░ I should call you over to the gallery sometime,░ I always have trouble with those little accent marks.░ So, %playername%,░ what does a jokester like you do for a day job?
Events.Title: Mercy

Events.Text: <i>I smiled and took a sip of my drink,░ taking her in for a moment before letting out a sigh.
Events.Title: %playername%

Events.Text: Hope it's not dumb to say,░ but I'm glad I met you tonight.░ I think this trip was the pick-me-up I needed,░ I'm glad I got dragged out.
Events.Title: %playername%

Events.Text: That's not dumb to say.░ Glad we could perk each other up.░ The gallery I run is fun,░ but not exactly a place to let my hair down.░ I can empathize entirely.
Events.Title: Mercy

Events.Text: Honestly,░ my last job was a lot of rushing around,░ but being stuck browsing the market for new work is far more tedious.░ Needless to say, I'm glad to be out of my own head a little.
Events.Title: %playername%

Events.Text: <i>I tipped my glass, toasting her earnestly.░ She returned the gesture.
Events.Title: %playername%

Events.Text: Well,░ I'm glad you found this bar lush amusing enough.
Events.Title: Mercy

Events.Text: So,░ if you don't mind me asking,░ what brought someone like you to a club like this?
Events.Title: %playername%

Events.Text: <i>She looked around as if for the first time,░ taking a slow sip of her drink before chuckling a small laugh.
Events.Title: %playername%

Events.Text: Honestly?░ Sometimes I wonder why I come here...
Events.Title: Mercy

Events.Text: The atmosphere isn't bad, and I don't mind the show,░ but, yeah...░ Ever get that feeling like maybe you're stalled?░ Waiting...░ Waiting on the right person, maybe?░ Or maybe just the waiting to grow up.
Events.Title: Mercy

Events.Text: I can empathize,░ but, from one stranger to another,░ I doubt you'll be waiting long.░ You've been fun to talk with.░ Hopefully I'll catch you again, I'm going to take a quick break.
Events.Title: %playername%

Choices.Text: (Let her down gently, no need to get weepy. (Leave.))

Events.Text: Cya around.
Events.Title: Mercy

Events.Text: So, Mercy,░ is there a generous boyfriend I have to worry about upsetting?
Events.Title: %playername%

Events.Text: Haha, smooth,░ but no.░ No one like that.░
Events.Title: Mercy

Events.Text: <i>I let out a little sigh, half for show.░ She laughed a little, a happy melody that refreshed me as more than our drinks.
Events.Title: %playername%

Events.Text: Okay,░ good.░ Mind if I ask what you do for a job?░ As tasteful as your outfit is,░ I imagine it's something impressive.
Events.Title: %playername%

Events.Text: I manage a gallery and a couple of artist studios in the city,░ nothing too fancy.░ Honestly, there's not much to say,░ I enjoy it,░ but it's not exactly a place I can let my hair down.░
Events.Title: Mercy

Events.Text: Wow, well I'm impressed!░ I'm in the market for something new, myself,░ so you've got me beat handily.
Events.Title: %playername%

Events.Text: <i>Turning to the drink I occupied myself with a slow sip.░ She sighed next to me, finger running along the edge of her glass.
Events.Title: %playername%

Choices.Text: (Flirt overtly, this has been one big tease.)
(Let her down gently, no need to get weepy. (Leave.))

Events.Text: Honestly,░ from one stranger to another,░ you've been a lot of fun to talk with.░ Hopefully I'll catch you again, I'm going to take a quick break.
Events.Title: %playername%

Events.Text: <i>I drained most of the drink and let out a contented sigh before meeting her eyes.
Events.Title: %playername%

Events.Text: I can empathize with that,░ since getting here it's been all about 'the chase'.░ I'm glad we got to relax together,░ I've got the feeling you're the sort of friend I've been missing.
Events.Title: %playername%

Events.Text: I'm glad to hear it.░ Hell, you're right,░ no need to go from zero to 40 in a single night, right?░
Events.Title: Mercy

Events.Text: I wouldn't want to push my luck,░ if I took my brother as an example, it rarely works out for the long-term.
Events.Title: %playername%

Events.Text: Ha...░ Maybe only 20.
Events.Title: Mercy

Events.Text: <i>She smiled and nodded, finishing her drink.░ Reaching into her purse she handed me her business card.
Events.Title: %playername%

Events.Text: Thanks for being...░ Well, thanks.░ Give me a call sometime, huh?
Events.Title: Mercy

Events.Text: <i>She flushed a little with a smirk,░ seeming to squirm at the bar a little.░ I placed my hand on hers and gave an earnest smile.
Events.Title: %playername%

Events.Text: I'd like the chance to push my luck another time.
Events.Title: %playername%

Events.Text: Good to know...░ For now, it's getting late.░ Give me a call some time?░ You can reach me on my cell or the gallery number.
Events.Title: Mercy

Events.Text: I thought I sensed a...░ kindred spirit...
Events.Title: Mercy

Events.Text: I'll be honest, Mercy,░ I'd hate to come back and not see you here.░ Is there some way we can keep in contact?
Events.Title: %playername%

Events.Text: I feel the same.░ I can't always make it to the club,░ but you can always give me a call.░ I'd like to spend more time with you, maybe a few cocktails back.░ No need to go from zero to 40 in a single night, right?
Events.Title: Mercy

Events.Text: I have to be honest,░ I was hoping I'd meet someone here,░ but I wouldn't have dared hope for someone like you.
Events.Title: %playername%

Events.Text: I feel the same,░ trust me.
Events.Title: Mercy

Events.Text: <i>I cupped her hand on the bar and stroked over her fingers:░ here goes nothing.
Events.Title: %playername%

Events.Text: I'd like to see you again,░ see where this is going...░
Events.Title: %playername%

Events.Text: <i>She flushed a little with a smirk,░ seeming to squirm in her seat trying to decide before reaching into her purse to retrieve a card.
Events.Title: %playername%

Events.Text: Slipping from the bar stool she stood, awkwardly tottering,░ she was more than a little drunk.░ Mercy blushed as she smoothed her dress down,░ was that a...░ bulge?░ Well...░ that's certainly a development.░
Events.Title: %playername%

Events.Text: <i>Mercy was still nursing her drink as I made my way back over to her.
Events.Title: %playername%

Events.Text: Oh, hey.░ %playername%, right?
Events.Title: Mercy

Events.Text: Hey Mercy,░ sorry to bail like that,░ I thought I saw my brother in the middle of his newest big mistake.
Events.Title: %playername%

Events.Text: <i>She laughed and shook her head as if to say it was okay.
Events.Title: %playername%

Events.Text: But,░ I also didn't want to make the mistake of missing out on our conversation.░ What do you say?
Events.Title: %playername%

Events.Text: That line earns you a few apology points,░ if it's worth anything.░ I'm game to talk more if you are?
Events.Title: Mercy

Events.Text: <i>I gave an exaggerated wipe of my brow and met her blush with a smile,░ she was too cute to pass up.
Events.Title: %playername%

Events.Text: Glad I didn't miss my chance,░ I'd have to write off the whole evening as a loss. Lucky me.
Events.Title: %playername%

Events.Text: <i>Shifting under her gaze she raised an eyebrow as if to say 'No?'░ I nodded, biting my lip as I let my thighs relax as her eyes rolled over me.
Events.Title: %playername%

Events.Text: <i>I figured I'd give Mercy another shot.
Events.Title: %playername%

Events.Text:
<i>She was sitting by herself still, looking sullen.░ Did I do that?░ 
If I wasn't mistaken, that was a new drink...
Events.Title: %playername%

Choices.Text: (She is pretty drunk, maybe she won't remember?)
(Maybe this is the game she likes to play? (Tease her.))

Events.Text: Maybe later...
Events.Title: %playername%

Events.Text: <i>I took a deep breath,░ she was drunk, it's not like she'd recognize me.░ I headed over and cleared my throat: she looked pretty down.
Events.Title: %playername%

Events.Text: Huh?░
Events.Title: Mercy

Events.Text: Hi, I just saw you from across the club.░ Do you mind if I sit with you?
Events.Title: %playername%

Events.Text: <i>I smiled earnestly.░
Events.Title: %playername%

Events.Text: Don't I know you?
Events.Title: Mercy

Events.Text: Great,░ well %playername%, congratulations,░ you really fooled me!░ Glad I can upgrade you from asshat to douchebag.
Events.Title: Mercy

Events.Text: <i>Before I could react she stood, splashing her drink in my face, and stormed off.░ Two of the lounge-goers burst out laughing and I rushed upstairs to the restrooms to clean up.
Events.Title: %playername%

Events.Text: Okay...░ I deserved that.
Events.Title: %playername%

Events.Text: <i>I made my way over to Mercy,░ she saw me coming and folded her hands over her lap, looking sullen.░
Events.Title: %playername%

Events.Text: What is it...░ Haven't done making a fool of me yet?
Events.Title: Mercy

Events.Text: Listen...░ I don't know what kind of game you're playing,░ but maybe you should think about other people's feelings before you start this game.
Events.Title: %playername%

Events.Text: If you were 'that way'... Well,░ I certainly didn't want to find out a few drinks in!░ I'm sure you're aware how weird it'd be if I took you home!
Events.Title: %playername%

Events.Text: Right,░ you wanted to fuck around and I'm not what you wanted.░ I can see how it'd be my fault if you accidentally tried to fuck me after just meeting me.
Events.Title: Mercy

Events.Text: Look,░ all I'm saying is you should tell someone before you lead them on like that!
Events.Title: %playername%

Events.Text: <i>She stood, looking defensive.░ Her blush was now one of fury as she squeezed the life out of her purse.
Events.Title: %playername%

Events.Text: I'll be sure to wear a sign in future,░ I would hate to offend you.░ Are we done here?
Events.Title: Mercy

Events.Text: <i>Mercy stormed off towards the exit.░ Shaking my head I went back to the main floor.░ Fine by me.
Events.Title: %playername%

Events.Text: <i>She stormed towards the exit,░ like I was going to let her leave me in the middle of the lounge like that.
Events.Title: %playername%

Events.Text: Wait!
Events.Title: %playername%

Events.Text: Fuck you!
Events.Title: Mercy

Events.Text: Don't walk away from me!░ You're in the wrong here!
Events.Title: %playername%

Events.Text: <i>Gritting her teeth she seemed on the verge of tears as she stopped in the parking lot.
Events.Title: %playername%

Events.Text: Just leave me alone, jerk!
Events.Title: Mercy

Events.Text: We can't all be as confident as you.░ I wasn't going to do anything,░ just...░ leave me alone.
Events.Title: Mercy

Events.Text: <i>I stepped up and-
Events.Title: %playername%

Events.Text: <i>CRACK!
Events.Title: %playername%

Events.Text: You okay there?
Events.Title: Rou

Events.Text: Doing okay, Casanova?
Events.Title: Rou

Events.Text: I'll...░ Be...░ fine...
Events.Title: %playername%

Events.Text: <i>Really, a crotch shot?
Events.Title: %playername%

Events.Text: <i>I walked over with my head down,░ Mercy saw me coming and looked up.
Events.Title: %playername%

Events.Text: Hey,░ wasn't sure I'd see you again.
Events.Title: Mercy

Choices.Text: I said I was just checking on my brother.
Yeah... I think I made a mistake. (Reconcile.)
I saw 'something' that changed my mind. (Flirt.)
Just back to chat some more. (Chat.)
Just making sure you're okay. Cya. (Leave.)

Events.Text: Right...░ You know how much that sounds like an excuse right?
Events.Title: Mercy

Events.Text: I thought I owed you more than just bailing like that.░ I'm sorry.
Events.Title: %playername%

Events.Text: Yeah,░ I figured we could chat more.░ If you wanted?
Events.Title: %playername%

Events.Text: To be honest,░ a 'little friend' of yours convinced me to come back.
Events.Title: %playername%

Events.Text: <i>Smirking I pointed to my crotch subtly and gave a knowing wink.░ She flushed immediately, but dropped her smile.
Events.Title: %playername%

Events.Text: I figured you'd understand...
Events.Title: Mercy

Events.Text: Listen,░ I don't really feel comfortable discussing it in the middle of a club.
Events.Title: Mercy

Events.Text: Lemme be honest here.░ If I knew that right off the bat, I think we'd already be exploring the concept in depth:░ if you know what I mean.
Events.Title: %playername%

Events.Text: Is that so?
Events.Title: Mercy

Events.Text: You know it.░ Not that I'm greedy, but it seems like the best of both worlds to me.
Events.Title: %playername%

Events.Text: <i>She scoffed, blushing as she got up.░ Her arms crossed over her purse in front of her, she took a few steps towards the restrooms.
Events.Title: %playername%

Events.Text: That's the kind of thing you go in for, huh?░ Sure.░ Give me a minute to freshen up?
Events.Title: Mercy

Events.Text: You know it, hon.
Events.Title: %playername%

Events.Text: <i>She sauntered off quickly,░ the curve of her ass bouncing as I took her seat and enjoyed watching her go.
Events.Title: %playername%

Events.Text: Yep...
Events.Title: %playername%

Events.Text: She'll be back any minute...
Events.Title: %playername%

Events.Text: I hope you wouldn't think something like that would bother me,░ is all I mean.░ I'm still interested in getting to know you.
Events.Title: %playername%

Events.Text: I'm sorry.░ Listen,░ it's getting late and we've both had a few drinks.░ I'd hate to leave things where we did and never see you again.░ Is there some way I can contact you?░
Events.Title: %playername%

Events.Text: Listen,░ tell me if I'm out of line here,░ but I might have noticed a thing or two...░
Events.Title: %playername%

Events.Text: <i>I cleared my throat as the goat girl crossed her hands in her lap.░ I gave a half nod.
Events.Title: %playername%

Events.Text: I can understand how I might have made things difficult for you.░ I just wanted to say sorry, for anything I might have done.
Events.Title: %playername%

Events.Text: I...░ Wow...░ Yes, thank you.░ I appreciate that %playername%.
Events.Title: Mercy

Choices.Text: Good, I didn't want to feel like an asshole. (Leave.)

Events.Text: <i>I returned her smile and nodded.
Events.Title: %playername%

Events.Text: It's all good, I just wanted a chance to say goodbye.░ Didn't wanna leave it like that.░ Hey,░ if you're back here next week, hopefully I can buy you a drink or something?
Events.Title: %playername%

Events.Text: I'd like that, yeah.░ Thank you, %playername%,░ you're one of the good ones.░ Goodbye for now.
Events.Title: Mercy

Events.Text: <i>She gave me a small hug as she headed to the entrance.░ I'm glad I could set things right, I wouldn't want to upset her.
Events.Title: %playername%

Events.Text: Yeah,░ you know what?░ I'd like that,░ give me a call some time maybe?░ We can chat prior to the cocktails.░ Thanks for the night, %playername%.
Events.Title: Mercy

Events.Text: <i>Slipping her hand into her purse she handed me her business card as she headed off,░ a little unsteady on her feet.░ A gallery owner, huh?░ I should've guessed.
Events.Title: %playername%

Events.Text: Thanks,░ but,░ to be honest, you caught me on the way out...
Events.Title: Mercy

Events.Text: The night's still young!
Events.Title: %playername%

Events.Text: You know what...░ why not?
Events.Title: Mercy

Events.Text: <i>Getting up she stumbled forward;░ thankfully steading herself before she butted me with those horns.░ Sheesh,░ okay, maybe she's had a few too many...
Events.Title: %playername%

Choices.Text: I should trade numbers and get her a cab...

Events.Text: Actually...░ heh...░ You look about ready to go, huh?░ Lemme get you a cab.
Events.Title: %playername%

Events.Text: Urrp...░ Yeah...░ okay.
Events.Title: Mercy

Events.Text: <i>Walking her out was an oddly intimate affair:░ my arm around her waist whilst she leaned her supple body on mine.░ Sitting out in the fresh air, she seemed to perk up a little.
Events.Title: %playername%

Events.Text: Thanks for the help...░ I can't help but feel like I made a fool of myself...░
Events.Title: Mercy

Events.Text: Nah...░ It happens to the best of us!
Events.Title: %playername%

Events.Text: <i>It wasn't long before a taxi pulled in.░ I couldn't just let her leave....
Events.Title: %playername%

Events.Text: Note to self:░ vigorous movement░ plus drunk girl░ equals░ BAD...░ We didn't get a few steps before she barfed inelegantly into one of the standing trash receptacles.░ Messy...░
Events.Title: %playername%

Events.Text: Hey,░ this isn't exactly a nunnery.░ Hell, some of the guys here are practically waving theirs around!
Events.Title: %playername%

Events.Text: <i>Mercy quailed as she slipped from the seat.░ Taking a few steps towards the exit,░ she held her purse between us as a shield.
Events.Title: %playername%

Events.Text: Oh, no, please:░ do discuss my personal life LOUDER...░ Are you stupid or something?
Events.Title: Mercy

Events.Text: I'll be sure to wear a big neon sign next time,░ thank you.
Events.Title: Mercy

Events.Text: Wait up!
Events.Title: %playername%

Events.Text: Leave me alone!
Events.Title: Mercy

Events.Text: <i>Following her out I caught up with her in the lot outside.░ She seemed on the verge of tears and furious with me:░ but I guess I deserved that.
Events.Title: %playername%

Events.Text: Mercy,░ will you give me just a second?
Events.Title: %playername%

Events.Text: Why should I?
Events.Title: Mercy

Events.Text: Just...░ Be safe I guess...
Events.Title: %playername%

Events.Text: I need a drink...
Events.Title: %playername%

Events.Text: With a body like yours?░ I wouldn't hide it!░ You could get anyone you wanted.
Events.Title: %playername%

Events.Text: Look at me...░ Honestly we're a lot more alike than you might think...
Events.Title: %playername%

Events.Text: Mercy,░ I'm sorry.░ I feel like an asshole.
Events.Title: %playername%

Events.Text: Well...░ I asked you <i>not<i> to pry,░ yet here we are.
Events.Title: Mercy

Events.Text: <i>I kicked my foot against the gravel,░ a hot wash of shame creeping over my face.
Events.Title: %playername%

Events.Text: My brother lives the...░ Well,░ let's just say he's pretty at home in this club.░ I let the excitement of the night get to me,░ a lot of the clientele aren't exactly...░ subtle.░ I shouldn't have assumed.
Events.Title: %playername%

Events.Text: Fine...░ accepted....
Events.Title: Mercy

Events.Text: I'm sorry,░ I hope you get home safe.
Events.Title: %playername%

Events.Text: I understand.░ Take care.
Events.Title: Mercy

Events.Text: I'm sorry.░ Listen,░ it's getting late and we've both had a few drinks.░ I'd hate to leave things where we did and never see you again.░ Is there some way I can contact you?░
Events.Title: %playername%

Events.Text: Fine...░ I have been drinking,░ maybe I overreacted...░ I'm taking a lot on faith here %playername%...
Events.Title: Mercy

Events.Text: Here's my number.░ Maybe next meeting we'll lay off the sauce, huh?
Events.Title: Mercy

Events.Text: <i>Slipping her hand into her purse she handed me her business card as she headed off,░ a little unsteady on her feet.░ A gallery owner, huh?░ I should've guessed.
Events.Title: %playername%

Events.Text: Right...░ Sorry, trying to make a joke.░ %playername%, we spoke earlier.░
Events.Title: %playername%

Events.Text: I know that, dummy.░ You think I'm that wasted?
Events.Title: Mercy

Events.Text: I know, I know,░ I'm sorry.░ Honestly, I think I'm a little rusty at this.
Events.Title: %playername%

Events.Text: I hope you don't think something like that would bother me.░ I'm sure my leaving might have seemed like it, so...░ sorry.
Events.Title: %playername%

Events.Text: You deserve better than that, Mercy.░ I'm sure you have your reasons,░ and I'm sure as hell not going to judge you for them.
Events.Title: %playername%

Events.Text: <i>I sighed, embarrassed blush painful on my face.
Events.Title: %playername%

Events.Text: For what it's worth,░ I was enjoying my time with you.░ You're stunning,░ and if I fucked up a chance to get to know you better then I'm the one missing out, not you.
Events.Title: %playername%

Events.Text: Hey, Mercy.░ I'm here for round two now that I know where this is going.
Events.Title: %playername%

Events.Text: If I'm being honest,░ you're more of my type with what you have going on there.
Events.Title: %playername%
